name: Panel Menu Inspired Firefox Menu Button
description:
This style works best with the Movable Firefox Button extension: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/movable-firefox-button/

Small changes to the Firefox button using an existing image (devtools ftw!).
It is somewhat inspired by the designs for the upcoming panel menu.
additional_info:
* Works best with the Movable Firefox Button extension.

* 2012-05-03: Thanks to epk1950 for the data URI (base64).
This no longer requires firefox 14.
